Awesome.DON'T be discouraged by the amount of tourists. Locals frequent this place too!DO get here half an hour before lunch and dinner to get a good spot.DON'T sit at a table and order off the menu.DO sit at the bar and order what looks good on the counter.DO flag the bartender and point to what looks good.DON'T forget to allot nap time for the coma to follow.RECOMMENDATIONS:Pa amb tomàquet (Catalan bread rubbed  with tomato)Pulpo a la Gallega (Octopus)Every sandwich with ham on it.Every montadito on the counter.xx
